long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Oscilloscope that captures your browser tab's audio for analysis. 

*NOTE* - Ensure oscilloscope is opened on the browser tab outputting audio. 

Version 1.0 features:

Real-time Audio Visualization:

Captures and displays audio waveforms from your active browser tab
Provides a dynamic, visual representation of sound in real-time

Customizable Display:

Resizable window for optimal viewing
Full-screen mode
Multiple color palettes to suit your preferences

Interactive Controls:

Click-to-pause functionality for detailed waveform analysis
dBFS readings for accurate audio level monitoring

User-Friendly Interface:

Intuitive controls for easy navigation
Seamless integration with Chrome browser

Please send any feedback, bug reports, or feature requests to scopicaudio@gmail.com.
